ml.alternet.security

Interface Password.Clear

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClearPassword
    Enclosing interface:
    Password

    public static interface Password.Clear
extends AutoCloseable
    This class helps keeping low the period where a password appear in clear in the memory, in order to make it difficult to find when a memory dump is performed. Usage : 
     try (Password.Clear clear = password.getClearCopy()) {
     char[] clearPwd = clear.get();
     // use clearPwd in the block
 }
 // at this point clearPwd has been cleaned
 // before being eligible by the garbage collector
    The user has to ensure to keep the try-with-resource block as short as possible, and to not make copies of the char array if possible. Once closed, a ClearPassword can't be reused.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Unset the clear password after usage.
      char[] get()
      Get a clear copy of the password ; the password remains obfuscated until this method is invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        char[] get()
        Get a clear copy of the password ; the password remains obfuscated until this method is invoked.
        Returns:
        The clear password.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If this password has been invalidated.

      • close

        void close()
        Unset the clear password after usage.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
